sentences.en: ...a piece of candy.
sentences.cn: …一块糖果。

sentences.en: a box of candies
sentences.cn: 一盒糖果

sentences.en: a box of candy
sentences.cn: 一盒糖果

sentences.en: a candy bar
sentences.cn: 巧克力条

sentences.en: a chocolate candy bar
sentences.cn: 巧克力条

sentences.en: Animation has stopped being eye-candy for kids and geeks and become mainstream entertainment.
sentences.cn: 动画不再仅仅吸引小孩子和动漫迷的眼球，而成了主流娱乐方式。

sentences.en: Back then, women on TV were mostly seen as eye candy.
sentences.cn: 那时候，电视中的女性大多都被看作花瓶。

sentences.en: Do you want a piece of candy?
sentences.cn: 你要吃颗糖吗？

sentences.en: Have a piece of candy, please.
sentences.cn: 请吃块糖.

sentences.en: He coughed up the candy that was stuck in his throat.
sentences.cn: 他把卡在喉咙里的糖咯了出来.

sentences.en: He tried to appease the crying child by giving him candy.
sentences.cn: 他试图给那个啼哭的孩子糖果使他不哭.

sentences.en: His pocket was all gummed up with candy.
sentences.cn: 他的口袋全被糖粘住了.

sentences.en: His pockets bulged with apples and candy.
sentences.cn: 他的口袋鼓鼓地装满了苹果和糖.

sentences.en: It was greedy of them to eat up all the candy.
sentences.cn: 他们把所有的糖都吃光了,真贪吃.

sentences.en: My fingers gummed together as the sticky candy melted in my hand.
sentences.cn: 黏糖在我手中化开了,把我的手指粘住了.

sentences.en: She returns to the big screen to play Candy's overbearing mother, Rose.
sentences.cn: 她又重返大银幕，扮演坎迪专横的母亲罗丝。

sentences.en: Take a candy from the box.
sentences.cn: 从盒子里拿出一块糖果.

sentences.en: The child is eager to have the candy.
sentences.cn: 那孩子巴不得拿到糖.

sentences.en: The eager children mobbed the candy man the moment he appeared.
sentences.cn: 卖糖果的人刚出现,急切的孩子们便把他包围了.

sentences.en: This candy is so hard that no one can chew it.
sentences.cn: 这种糖太硬,没人嚼得动.

words.tran_cn: 甜蜜的；糖制的；甜言蜜语的
把…制成糖果；美化（candy的过去分词）
新潮的（服饰）；甜言蜜语的
用糖煮；使结晶为砂糖；美化

phrases.tran_cn: n. 单独包装的块状糖

trans.tran_cn: 新潮的（服饰）；甜言蜜语的

trans.tran_en: a sweet food made from sugar or chocolate
a sweet food made from sugar or chocolate

trans.tran_cn: 用糖煮；使结晶为砂糖；美化
